name: code-challenge
description: Fork this repo and create a Full Stack app using languages and frameworks of your choice that  *literally* introduces you to us. Submit your response back to us here in the form of a pull  request or submit it to us privately. Please don't spend more than a couple hours on it. It's ok if you don't finish, just tackle the requirements in order and take it as far as you can in the time frame.
author: Cynthia Xu
